messages.message: does it make sense that a Project can be renamed at anytime, yet the App that it builds to can not have it’s name changed at all? If I start a project named “Insurance”, publish an app with the same name, and then at a later time change the project name to “Banking”, the app that it publishes will still be stuck with the initial name it was given (in this case “Insurance”). I only bring this up because a few times I’ve lost track of what project builds to what app.
i think we restrict this because our backend doesn’t handle different versions of the same app having different names - is that right? @Adam
Correct. We don’t have a way on the backend to associate multiple versions of an app together aside from them having the same name
I imagined it was a technical limitation, though could be worthwhile to consider restricting renaming a project.
